RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 59. Claiming Purse 13500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 8 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since June 8 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CONTESSINA saved ground into the stretch, shifted outside the leader at the top of the stretch, responded full of run under right handed urging to make the lead late and won going away. BANK BUSTER away alertly, set the pace along the inside until deep stretch then was no match for the winner. LADY GIULIANA chased the pace into the stretch then faded. MANGORITA forwardly placed, was through after a half. CONDUTTORE trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Conduttore
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Contessina
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, angled out top stretch, full of run, going away

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: California Chrome Syndicate & Cowboy Stables, LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Mangorita
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Bank Buster
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace late stretch, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Giuliana
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, faded lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 62. Maiden Claiming Purse 15000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MARSICO away alertly, set a pressured pace for a half, opened a daylight lead in upper stretch and prevailed under right handed urging. INSACIABLE PRINCE broke outward bumping HEART OF AN ANGEL at the start, trailed early then rallied determinedly in the four path through the stretch and was steadily cutting into the winners' advantage. EL BANDIDO close up early, dropped back on the turn then came on again late in the six path. FEVER DREAM stumbled for several strides out of the gate, rushed to contention outside rivals, had speed for a half then was used up. HEART OF AN ANGEL was bumped at the start, pressured the winner two wide for a half then gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: El Bandido
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, dropped back turn, came again,

ENTRY.NAME: Marsico
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace, drew off top lane, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Fever Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled badly start, rushed to contention, used up,

ENTRY.NAME: Insaciable Prince
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke outward, bumped start, closed willingly 4path, clear second

ENTRY.NAME: Heart of an Angel
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, pressed pace 2 wide, through after half,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 88. Claiming Purse 30800. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 8 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 8 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BRIG broke in full stride to set all the pace and maintained his advantage under right handed urging. MO DONT NO stalked the pace and got up for second two wide under right handed urging. TOTELLYOUTHETRUTH chased the winner near the inside and was outfinished. IT'S YOUR CALL close up along the inside, suffered a catastrophic injury nearing the turn, pulled up and was euthanized.

ENTRY.NAME: Brig
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, led throughout, drew off, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: It's Your Call
ENTRY.COMMENT: close inside, injured before turn, pulled up,

ENTRY.NAME: Totellyouthetruth
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Mo Dont No
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, up place, right handed urging,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 70. Claiming Purse 17400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE AUGUST 8, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 8 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 8 Allowed 4 lbs. Clai ming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HIGHLY EXPLOSIVE was fractious in the gate, always within striking distance, saved ground into the turn, rallied three wide into the stretch, made the lead before the furlong marker and drew off under brisk handling. CARMEN OHIO dueled for the lead along the inside until deep stretch then was no match for the winner. PISTOL PACKIN BOS matched strides for the lead two wide into the stretch and was outfinished. MY BELLE MICHELLE unhurried early, found her best stride late inside. HERE COMES JIGS close up inside, failed to respond. CHECK OUT LINE vied for the lead three then four wide into the stretch and weakened late. JERSEY BOUNCE trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: My Belle Michelle
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, best stride late inside

ENTRY.NAME: Jersey Bounce
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Carmen Ohio
ENTRY.OWNER: Royer Family Stables LLC and Aurora Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Here Comes Jigs
ENTRY.COMMENT: close inside, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Highly Explosive
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious in gate, saved ground turn, rallied 3w, drew off,

ENTRY.NAME: Check Out Line
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 3-4wide, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Pistol Packin Bos
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2 wide, outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 64. Claiming Purse 17400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE AUGUST 8, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 8 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 8 Allowed 4 lbs. Clai ming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CONGRATS JENSEN broke sharply, was hustled along, set a pressured pace into the turn then widened the balance of the trip under left handed urging to win as much the best. HIGH CUPPER trailed into the turn, swung wide, rallied late five wide and got up for second. NORTHERN JOURNEY never far back, offered a mild bid along the inside into the stretch then was outfinished. CRISTALINDA unhurried early swung wide and passed tiring rivals. SWEET EMPIRE pressed the pace three wide and weakened on the turn. SWINDLE pressed the pace two wide into the stretch then tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Cristalinda
ENTRY.COMMENT: swung wide, passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Northern Journey
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move inside, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: High Cupper
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, swung wide, rallied 5 wide, up place

ENTRY.NAME: Congrats Jensen
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pressured pace, drew off, much the best,

ENTRY.NAME: Swindle
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, tired lane

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Empire
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 3 wide, weakened turn

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 83. Claiming Purse 12200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE AUGUST 8, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 8 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 8 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RIVERBOAT GAMBLER was bumped at the start, had good early speed between horses two wide, took back and angled out three wide, rallied into the stretch, to make the lead near the furlong marker and drew off while drifting out under right handed urging. KOSCIUSZKO drifted in at the start, dueled for the lead two wide and gamely gained second. DAD'S YANKEES battled for the lead along the inside until deep stretch and was outfinished. KHALFANI close up from the start, swung wide and went evenly. SNAP HOOK failed to menace. TUFF ATTACK was in tight between rivals soon after the start, stalked the pace three then two wide and faded in the stretch. LEOMBRUNO broke inward bumping the winner at the start and was no threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Khalfani
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, swung wide, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Dad's Yankees
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Riverboat Gambler
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, close up, rallied 3w, drifted, drew clear,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Jennifer Kaak & Thoroughbreds By Design, LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Leombruno
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke inward, bumped start, no threat,

ENTRY.COMMENT: in tight start, stalked3-2wide, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Kosciuszko
ENTRY.COMMENT: drifted in start, dueled, 2 wide, gamely gained second

ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 65. Allowance Purse 28000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 8 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 8 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Consi dered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TAKE CHARGE CHLOE prompted the pace two wide for a half, made the lead entering the stretch when put to right handed pressure, quickly opened a daylight advantage and won under a hand ride. GRACIE DANCE with the second flight two wide, had a mild late rally in the five path and finished clear for second. CHARLOTTES WAY sprinted to the lead leaving the chute, set a pressured pace along the inside for a half then weakened in the stretch. MY D'VALENTINE stalked the early pace along the inside and was through after a half. FLASH OF CHEROKEE trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Charlottes Way
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pressured pace inside, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Flash of Cherokee
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: My d'Valentine
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, inside, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Take Charge Chloe
ENTRY.OWNER: Blackleaf Farms LLC and Davis Raymond L
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, clear quickly, ridden out,

ENTRY.NAME: Gracie Dance
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, 2 wide, mild rally 5path, clear second

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 33. Maiden Special Weight Purse 33900. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COLOR BEARER vied for the lead three wide, rallied through the turn to make the lead past the quarter pole then widened the balance of the trip to win as much the best while in hand. WHY KENNY WHY allowed to settle, rallied through the stretch three wide and finished second best. WAR ON THE RIVER set a pressured pace along the inside into the turn then was outfinished. MY TICKET hopped at the start, trailed early and had a mild rally late in the four path. MOMENT IN THE DARK pressed the pace two wide, made the lead on the turn then weakened late. MARQUITOS M broke inward bumping RAISE YOU ONE at the start, settled mid pack and lacked the needed response. RAISE YOU ONE stumbled then was bumped at the start and failed to reach contention. ROCKET LAUNCHER was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: War On the River
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace inside, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: My Ticket
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, mild rally late 4path

ENTRY.NAME: Moment in the Dark
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, led turn, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Why Kenny Why
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, late rally, 3 wide, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Rocket Launcher
ENTRY.COMMENT: through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Color Bearer
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, 3 wide, quick move, much the best, handily,

ENTRY.NAME: Raise You One
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled, bumped start, no factor,

ENTRY.COMMENT: broke inward, bumped start, no rally,
